title: MX Player Pro v1.7.41.apk
description:
MX Video Player is a powerful video player that lets you watch lots of video clips of various formats on your Android device. The player supports different codecs and lets you change the sound track of the video. More to it, it supports dual-core decoding of the videos, which leads to a 70% increase in performance in comparison with the mono-core Android devices.

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s New:
 Fixed subtitle download error while playing network media.
 Added Malayalam translation.
 Added an option for changing text style of last played media to italics under Settings > List > Theme
 Floating button on the list screen can be disabled optionally under Settings > List > Floating button
 Added an option for remembering playback screen selections for each files under Settings > Player > Remember selections. It is enabled by default
